angular-audio-player

go back

The idea is to progressively add tracks to the playlist (thru your application events), and *hope* the playlist stay consistant.

Simple Play
Next
Prev
audio1.playingTrack = {{ audio1.playingTrack }}

playlist1 = {{ playlist1 }}

# What it happens: Every 5seconds it gets added a new ```audioElement``` into the playlist. ### Initial Playlist: ```javascript var playlist1 = []; ``` ### Final Playlist: ```javascript var playlist1 = [ {"src":"http://www.metadecks.org/software/sweep/audio/demos/vocal2.ogg","type":"audio/ogg"}, {"src":"http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/7/79/Korn_-_Predictable_%28demo%29.ogg","type":"audio/ogg"}, {"src":"http://demos.w3avenue.com/html5-unleashed-tips-tricks-and-techniques/demo-audio.ogg","type":"audio/ogg"} ]; ``` ### Angular code (in this page!): ```javascript angular.module('myApp', ['angular-audio-player']) .controller('MyCtrl', function ($scope, $timeout) { $scope.playlist1 = []; $scope.playlist1.push({ src: 'http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/7/79/Korn_-_Predictable_%28demo%29.ogg', type: 'audio/ogg' }); $timeout(function () { $scope.playlist1.unshift({ src: 'http://www.metadecks.org/software/sweep/audio/demos/vocal2.ogg', type: 'audio/ogg'}); }, 5500); $timeout(function () { $scope.playlist1.push({ src: 'http://demos.w3avenue.com/html5-unleashed-tips-tricks-and-techniques/demo-audio.ogg', type: 'audio/ogg'}); }, 9500); }); ```
